SCOPE.LABEL: Scope
SCOPE.application:write_DESCRIPTION: grants write access to application configuration.
SCOPE.follow:read_DESCRIPTION: grants read access to endpoints related to follow requests and followers.
SCOPE.follow:write_DESCRIPTION: grants write access to endpoints related to follow requests and followers.
SCOPE.workouts:read_DESCRIPTION: grants read access to workouts and comments endpoints.
SCOPE.workouts:write_DESCRIPTION: grants write access to workouts and comments endpoints.

APP_CREATED_SUCCESSFULLY: Application created successfully. Make sure to copy the secret now, it won't show up again.
APP_DELETION_CONFIRMATION: Are you sure you want to delete this app?
TOKENS_REVOCATION_CONFIRMATION: Are you sure you want to revoke all tokens?
TOKENS_REVOKED: All existing associated tokens have been revoked.
